Reviews.Title: Not necessarily as the description explicitly states
Reviews.Author: jasonmichael75
Reviews.Content: Be careful of the dealer you purchase this phone from. Many of them are actually delivering the A6366 AT&T; branded model of the phone, claiming that the unlocked AT&T; version is identical to the international version. This is an inaccurate statement, as their hardware specs, specifically the frequencies the radios use for 3G, differ in such way that the international version is unable to utilize 3G in the U.S. and the AT&T; model is unable to utilize 3G in many places overseas. Ross Cellular shipped the AT&T; version (but was fantastic about having it returned) and abe-123 emailed this:This is the att model.  The photos shows att model.  When unlocked ATT model becomes the same phone as the international version.  Roms can be flashed to any version you want.>> Best regards,> AbeTo which I replied:Sorry, Abe. Your knowledge of this product is lacking. The picture is inaccurate based on the phone model and description (or, looking at it from your point of view, the model and description are inaccurate based on the picture). If you had any concern for the quality of the service and products you are offering, you would know that the A6380 international version of this phone features a different set of frequencies from the AT&T; model (A6366). In other words, the AT&T; model won't have access to the 3G network in the U.K., which is the phones intended destination. Therefore, as you are offering the "unlocked, unbranded international version (NOT the AT&T; model)", you should either change the picture or change the description. As you don't actually have the international version of the phone, I recommend the latter. Either way, don't try to pull the slick salesman (which equates to the ignorant salesman) act by trying to tell me that the two phones are equivalent, when their hardware dictates that they are not. Unlocking a device and flashing the rom to "any version you want" doesn't affect the base hardware specs. I will be reporting this issue to Amazon as well as posting feedback in the comments on the product page as this is just a negative buying experience waiting to happen.

Reviews.Title: Sold the wrong phone only works on Edge
Reviews.Author: J. Furner "JMF"
Reviews.Content: Was also disappointed, I love the phone, but it only works on Edge not 3G. They sent me the 6366a not the A6380 unlocked international phone, so I was duped here, I think Amazon should not allow people to do this to us.  I wanted a phone that has 3G, this was an AT&T; phone not an international phone and is not running on 3G, much slower, since using it with Simpel Mobile who works with T-Mobile. Still thinking about whether I should return the phone as it wasn't what I thought it should be, or able to do the 3G speed. Maybe I should ask for a partial refund???  I agree, you need to be careful of the sellers on here.

Reviews.Title: Doesnt look new
Reviews.Author: thamps
Reviews.Content: I purchased the new one but the back cover had lot of scratches and looks like someone had used it. Shipping and delivery was on time. Will never buy again

Reviews.Title: ARIA
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Jenkins
Reviews.Content: Love this phone.  When I received it, it wasn't in a sealed package so I don't think it was brand new.  Also it came with an AT&T; branded 2.2.2 ROM. That is the only complaint I have about the seller advertisement.I switched from an iphone so, things I don't like about Android:There is no screenshot for unrooted phones.App manager is worse than just holding down to uninstall.Wish I could change the movie recording format to not be 3gp.Other than that, really loving it!  The HTC Sense interface is advertised as "incredible" and it really is incredible.  The traffic widgets and special overlaid touches to the base Android system are pretty wicked awesome.

Reviews.Title: HTC - Aria from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Aria
Reviews.Content: Guys, I bought unlocked HTC aria few days back, the phone is excellent and very compact too.  Performace is good. All features are working good except the Data Plan.  Data plan - internet is not working in A6380 model. wifi internet is working.  So when your a buying this modle, check first for data plan internet

Reviews.Title: Excelente telefono
Reviews.Author: Dario Carnelutti
Reviews.Content: Hace 1 mes compre el telefono y se ha comportado de maravilla.Pro:- Excelente resolucion- Buena camara- Buena velocidad- Tamaño excelente para llevarlo en un bolsillo.Cons- La bateria se descarga muy rapido con uso intenso- En ocasiones se pone muy lento por la publicidad de GoogleFunciona perfecto en VenezuelaEste modelo es 3G para Digitel. Para Movistar y Movilnet se debe usar el A6366 para obtener 3G.

Reviews.Title: htc aria
Reviews.Author: boomba
Reviews.Content: i ordered two of these phones and they were used phones and the condition it was in is ok for used phones just that the screen for one was not replaced neatly but they work great

Reviews.Title: Sim Card Doesn't Work
Reviews.Author: Angela Jerry
Reviews.Content: I liked the phone itself, it's very compact and I was ordering it for my daughter to replace another phone that she accidently broke.  This was in my price range until we are able to upgrade her line. I got the phone and put the sim card in and kept getting a sim card error.  I thought maybe I was doing something wrong so I took the phone to the A T & T store and the store associate said that it's not the sim card, it's the phone.  Also, trying to take the back cover off the phone is almost next to impossible. In the process of returning the phone.

Reviews.Title: THE WORST PHONE
Reviews.Author: TAVAN
Reviews.Content: THE PHONE DIED IN LESS THAN 2 MTHS. I GOT MAYBE A MONTHS WORTH OF USE OUT OF THE PHONE. THE VENDOR SERVICE IS EVEN WORSE. TAKE THE ADVISE OF AN OLD FOOL NEVER BUY THIS PHONE AND NEVER BUY FROM THIS VENDOR RUN FOR THE HILLS.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Curwin
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and it isn't working. I am fed up getting Rob by this site... Why these guys keep fooling People..

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
3G-enabled, Android 2.1-powered smartphone with 3.2-inch touchscreen display and customizable HTC Sense home screens
Compatible with AT&T; Navigator GPS turn-by-turn directions; free access to over 20,000 AT&T; Wi-Fi hotspots nationwide
5-megapixel camera/camcorder; Wi-Fi networking; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD expansion to 32 GB; access to personal and work e-mail
Up to 6 hours of talk time, up to 372 hours (15.5 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: HTC Aria A6366 Unlocked Phone with 5MP Camera, GPS, Wi-Fi and Android OS 2.1 - No Warranty - Black
